page.title: 04THE CIVIC CENTRE
page.content: There has been quite a lot of controversy about the new Civic Centre which was opened in 1982.The inside is said to look like the a ship's boiler_room because of all the pipes and metal steps.It is nicknamed "THE GREEN HOUSE" because of its glass frontage.It is our most modern building and has won many design awards.The town council meets here to decide how to spend its money. Interviews were held in the town to discover peoples attitude to the Civic Centre ect.The most common coment was "IT IS A:WASTE OF PUPLIC MONEY; MONSTROSITY AND AN EYESORE." 60% also said public transport was inadequate. The proposed shopping development was criticised.Some people want traffic diverted away from the front street.
